scripts.name: dev-client
scripts.command: nt --title "client dev" -d "{clientDestination}" pwsh -c code . && yarn run dev; nt --title "api prod" -d "{apiDestination}" pwsh -c yarn run postinstall && yarn run start-dev-db
scripts.description: client dev | admin none | api prod | db dev

scripts.name: dev-admin
scripts.command: nt --title "admin dev" -d "{adminDestination}" pwsh -c code . && yarn run dev; nt --title "api prod" -d "{apiDestination}" pwsh -c yarn run postinstall && yarn run start-dev-db
scripts.description: client dev | admin dev | api prod | db dev

scripts.name: dev-client-admin
scripts.command: nt --title "client dev" -d "{clientDestination}" pwsh -c code . && yarn run dev; nt --title "admin dev" -d "{adminDestination}" pwsh -c yarn run dev; nt --title "api prod" -d "{apiDestination}" pwsh -c yarn run postinstall && yarn run start-dev-db
scripts.description: client dev | admin prod | api prod | db dev

scripts.name: dev-api

scripts.name: full-prod
scripts.command: nt --title "client prod" -d "{clientDestination}" pwsh -c yarn run build && yarn run start-local; nt --title "admin prod" -d "{adminDestination}" pwsh -c yarn run build && yarn run start-local; nt --title "api prod" -d "{apiDestination}" pwsh -c yarn run postinstall && yarn run start
scripts.description: client prod | admin prod | api prod | db prod
